about_the_game:
Restore Balance in a Chaotic City


Skyward Steps Together is a third-person multiplayer parkour game set in a city kept in balance by the mystical Harmony Stone. On a peaceful day, a group of dissidents sabotages the stone, causing it to shatter and plunging the city into chaos. Buildings rise into the sky, and only the city's parkour runners can restore order.

As one of the city's agile parkour runners, you are the only hope for bringing back order. Your mission is to collect the scattered pieces of the Harmony Stone, reassemble it, and return the city to its former state of order.

Up to four players can join the adventure and navigate challenging parkour courses to bring peace back to the city.

Game Mode

You can join the adventure either solo or with your fellow friends. Up to four players are supported.

Dynamic Skills

Connect distant points with flat bridges to cross large gaps.


Teleport instantly between two points to bypass tough challenges.


Clear obstacles and reach new heights with ease.

Glider Mechanic

  • Start with a glider to descend safely from heights.
  • Position yourself at strategic points to plan your route.
  • Collect small stone pieces scattered across the map to recharge your glider.

Epic Quest

  • Gather larger stone fragments serving as checkpoints.
  • Overcome diverse parkour challenges.
  • Restore the ancient Harmony Stone to bring balance back to the city.

Leaderboard

Achieve the highest rank globally, either solo or as a team, by restoring the city's peace the fastest.

name: Skyward Steps Together

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 @ 3.30GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: The Harmony Stone shatters, scattering its fragments across the sky and plunging the city into chaos. Form a team of up to four players, navigate the parkour courses in the city, collect the stone fragments, and restore peace.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
